td.content: s:patient with C/O critical shortness of breath for 4 days that is frequent. pt also reports critical cough, critical dyspnea, Respiratory. patient is a 38 year old white F. denies any smoking denies any alcohol use o:Height 67 in, Weight 111 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, Tissue Culture causative organism (+), Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Productive cough of dark yellow sputum, rhonchi-LU, rales Bil a:Bronchitis p:administered Azithromycin - 500 mg 1st day, 250 mg, daily x 4 days, performed Tissue Culture, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
